Država: Trenutni način plaćanja nije moguće preuzeti.

Država: Molimo pristanite na sva pravila i uslove pre narudžbine.

Država: Da li ste sigurni da želite da obrišete ovaj PayPal nalog

Država: PayPal is not enabled for your merchant account.

Država: Transaction can not be voided if status of a PayPal partial settlement child transaction is settlement_pending.

Država: Too many concurrent attempts to refund this transaction. Try again later.

Država: Too many concurrent attempts to void this transaction. Try again later.

Country:
Accept credit/debit cards and PayPal in your Magento store.
No setup or monthly fees and your customers never leave your store to complete the purchase.
Država:
Prihvatite kreditne/debitne kartice i PayPal u prodavnici Magento.
Nema naknade za instalaciju ili mesečnih troškova i vaši kupci nikada neće napustiti vašu prodavnicu da bi dovršili kupovinu.

Country: Allow to Edit Shipping Address Entered During Checkout on PayPal Side
Država: Dozvoli uređivanje adrese za isporuku tokom plaćanje na stranici PayPal-a
Prikaži u korpi sa kupljenim artiklima
Proveriti da li je primenljivo za države

Country: CVV must be 4 digits for American Express and 3 digits for other card types.
Država: CVV must be 4 digits for American Express and 3 digits for other card types.

Država: Expiration year is invalid. It must be between 1975 and 2201.

Država: Credit card number must be 12-19 digits.

Država: Postal code may contain no more than 9 letter or number characters.

Država: Postal code can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and hyphens.

Država: US state codes must be two characters to meet PayPal Seller Protection requirements.

Država: Primenite filtere da biste dobili rezultate. Samo prvih 100 zapisa će biti prikazano u tabeli, a vama će biti omogućeno da preuzmete pun izveštaj u .csv formatu.

Država: Enable Credit Card auto-detection on Storefront

Država: If you don't specify the merchant account to use to process a transaction, Braintree will process it using your default merchant account.

Country: Be sure to Enable Advanced Fraud Protection in Your Braintree Account in Settings/Processing Section
Država: Be sure to Enable Advanced Fraud Protection in Your Braintree Account in Settings/Processing Section

Country: It is recommended to set this value to "PayPal" per store views.
Država: It is recommended to set this value to "PayPal" per store views.

Country: This feature needs be enabled first for the merchant account through PayPal technical support.
Država: This feature needs be enabled first for the merchant account through PayPal technical support.

Country: Dynamic descriptors are sent on a per-transaction basis and define what will appear on your customers credit card statements for a specific purchase. The clearer the description of your product, the less likely customers will issue chargebacks due to confusion or non-recognition. Dynamic descriptors are not enabled on all accounts by default. If you receive a validation error of 92203 or if your dynamic descriptors are not displaying as expected, please Braintree Support.
Država: Dynamic descriptors are sent on a per-transaction basis and define what will appear on your customers credit card statements for a specific purchase. The clearer the description of your product, the less likely customers will issue chargebacks due to confusion or non-recognition. Dynamic descriptors are not enabled on all accounts by default. If you receive a validation error of 92203 or if your dynamic descriptors are not displaying as expected, please Braintree Support.

Country:
The value in the business name field of a customer's statement. Company name/DBA section must be either 3, 7 or 12 characters
                                and the product descriptor can be up to 18, 14, or 9 characters respectively (with an * in between for a total descriptor name of 22 characters).
Država:
The value in the business name field of a customer's statement. Company name/DBA section must be either 3, 7 or 12 characters
                                and the product descriptor can be up to 18, 14, or 9 characters respectively (with an * in between for a total descriptor name of 22 characters).

Country: The value in the phone number field of a customer's statement. Phone must be 10-14 characters and can only contain numbers, dashes, parentheses and periods.
Država: The value in the phone number field of a customer's statement. Phone must be 10-14 characters and can only contain numbers, dashes, parentheses and periods.

Country: The value in the URL/web address field of a customer's statement. The URL must be 13 characters or shorter.
Država: The value in the URL/web address field of a customer's statement. The URL must be 13 characters or shorter.

Država: The Payment Token is not available to perform the request.

Država: Checkout failed to initialize. Verify and try again.

Država: The order wasn't placed. First, agree to the terms and conditions, then try placing your order again.
